channel.title: Mission Control - KieranHarrison [Auxy & Ableton]
channel.description:
I've had some time off from the Auxy Disco - due to starting a new job and also getting my teeth stuck into Ableton Live more.
So, for the first time I have just finished a song that was mainly conceived and formed in Auxy, then arranged and mixed/mastered in Ableton (with some smaller elements and layering also being added in Ableton.)
Any feedback on this would be class. Enjoy.
https://soundcloud.com/k-eer/mission-control/s-WHhNy

item.title: Mission Control - KieranHarrison [Auxy & Ableton]
item.dc:creator: XINTRIX
item.description:
Really liked it, very good for a first one!
